Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY FROM OEM
Reviews.Author: Becka Morgan
Reviews.Content: The company offering this product, OEM, states "These LCD are tested and they work 100%." This is a blatant lie. The screens have the connector cable torn off or damaged, so they do not function at all. When I complained I was told that a lot of people had the same complaint. They said they would return my money, but they have failed to do so. DO NOT BUY FROM OEM!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY FROM THEM
Reviews.Author: H
Reviews.Content: My phone arrived to me with some buttons jammed into the device. Other than the fact that its shipped with the slowest mailing company, why should they be careless with the products as well? Again, don't buy...

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: Jose Luis Parra Quebrada
Reviews.Content: excelente producto, muy buena calidad, y profesional en la atencion,me encanto el producto, recomiento este producto ampliamente, satisfaccion total. recomiendo esta tienda completamente

Reviews.Title: Lemon
Reviews.Author: Bankerchiq
Reviews.Content: The phone looked good out of the box, but right away I could tell it had problems. The lower part of the key pad and the volume buttons kept getting stuck. Then a week after I received it, the screen went blank. I took the phone to a local shop to fix it. They opened it up to discover it didn't have the original bb battery. It was not factory refurbished. The setting inside some of the parts were plastic and not well cleaned versus the original bb settings, etc. Two weeks later the lower row in the key pad went out again, now I can't dial any phone numbers with 7 or 9.  Can't text as the space button as well as some of the characters don't work.  I contacted the shipper and he said: well take it back to the shop to fix it or mail it back to me to fix it for you!!! So far I paid $117 for this lemon and $50 to fix it, that is almost 50% of the cost of the phone!  Not to mention the time and aggravation.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry on my life!
Reviews.Author: Jose F. Perez Cervantes "Paco"
Reviews.Content: Hello, the Blackberry it is wornderful, I am agree with the cost, with the performance.Thank You!

Reviews.Title: a lucy, great purchase
Reviews.Author: Farid M. K. Tawfik
Reviews.Content: I would like to thank whom is concern for the perfect purchae i've ever done.every thing was recieved with no harms.but it took allot of time, & the main problem i faced was that there wasn't any method to track the product via our post service after it was shiped to Saudi Arabia, which was a bit scary that any one may loose his item.Many thanks.Farid
